tool_description: An API showing climate change news around the world
name: Climate Change Live Test
title: Climate Change Live Test

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about climate change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-test2.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-test2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-test2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-test2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate change from all over the world
